doc:description.doc:para: net.sourceforge.KToshiba is a DBus interface implemented by KToshiba. It allows to change the keyboard backlight mode and timeout (if the laptop supports it) as well as toggling the touchpad and eco mode led state.
Changes the keyboard backlight mode of operation from FN-Z to Auto and viceversa.

doc:errors.doc:error: if an error occured while changing the keyboard backlight mode

doc:doc.doc:summary: The timeout of the keyboard backlight.

doc:description.doc:para: Set the timeout value for the keyboard backlight.

doc:errors.doc:error: if an error occured while setting the keyboard backlight timeout

doc:description.doc:para: Toggles the touchpad from enabled to disabled and viceversa.

doc:errors.doc:error: if an error occured while toggling the touchpad

doc:doc.doc:summary: Set the value of the ECO mode led state.

doc:description.doc:para: Set the state of the ECO mode led from on to off and viceversa.

doc:errors.doc:error: if an error occured while setting the ECO mode led state
